snippet.title: Ace Attorney: Investigations Collection - Trailer | Nintendo Direct 2024
snippet.description:
Here's the trailer for Ace Attorney: Investigations Collection, featuring Ace Attorney Investigations: Miles Edgeworth and the Western debut of Ace Attorney Investigations 2: Prosecutor’s Gambit. Gather information by interviewing people and collecting evidence in this visual novel adventure game collection. This collection lets you switch between the original sprites and new visuals, arrives with new language options, bonus features, and more.

Ace Attorney: Investigations Collection is coming to Nintendo Switch on September 6, 2024. It's also coming to PS4 (PlayStation 4), Xbox One, Windows, and Steam (PC).
